descriptions.rajaCepat: Raja Cepat is a company that offers an app-based platform providing cross-border courier services. Raja Cepat focuses on delivery services through land and air transportation for domestic destinations. Raja Cepat has provided land cargo expedition services since 2018.
descriptions.express: Raja Cepat Express is a Point to Point delivery service that helps all your goods distribution needs with various fleet options and security guarantees for goods during delivery. We also provide delivery to many destinations in one rate.
descriptions.services: We operate quality vehicles with trained drivers, and can be relied upon to deliver your cargo. Timeliness is our priority. And we strive to do our best to ensure every item you entrust remains in good condition.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Raja Cepat is committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal data

content.welcome: Welcome to the Raja Cepat platform. This Privacy Policy is designed to help you understand how we collect, use, disclose and/or process personal data that you have entrusted to us.
content.personalDataDefinition: Personal Data means data, whether true or not, about an individual who can be identified from that data, or from that data and other information that can or is likely to be accessible to an organization.
content.disclaimer: IF YOU DO NOT CONSENT TO THE PROCESSING OF YOUR PERSONAL DATA AS DESCRIBED IN THIS PRIVACY POLICY, PLEASE DO NOT USE OUR SERVICES OR ACCESS OUR WEBSITE.

collection.title: When Do We Collect Personal Data?

content.description: We will/may collect your personal data in the following situations:
situations: When you register and/or use our Services or Website
When you enter into an agreement or provide documents
When you use our electronic services
When you interact with us through various communication channels
When you conduct transactions through our Services
When you provide feedback, suggestions, or complaints

content.description: Personal data that may be collected by Raja Cepat includes:

backgroundAccess.title: Background Location Access
backgroundAccess.description: This application collects location data from your device, including when the app is running in the background, to support real-time package delivery processes to customers.

usageItems: Knowing the current location of drivers or couriers
Ensuring the package delivery process runs according to predetermined routes and schedules
Providing real-time location status updates to customers

userControl.title: User Control:
userControl.description: You can revoke location access permission at any time through your device settings. However, trip tracking functionality may not operate optimally without active location access.

usage.title: How Do We Use Your Information?

content.description: We use your personal data for various purposes, including:

purposes.title: Service Management
purposes.description: Managing, operating, and providing access to our services

purposes.title: Transaction Processing
purposes.description: Processing your applications, transactions, and communications

purposes.title: Personalization
purposes.description: Customizing your experience by displaying content according to your preferences

purposes.title: Security
purposes.description: Protecting personal safety and the rights, property, or safety of others

purposes.title: Communication
purposes.description: Contacting you for service and administrative purposes

purposes.title: Research & Development
purposes.description: Analyzing service usage to improve customer experience

measures.title: Security Measures
measures.description: We implement various security measures to ensure the safety of your personal data in our systems. User personal data is behind secure networks and can only be accessed by a small number of employees who have special access rights.

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.description: Although we use reasonable security arrangements, there is no guarantee of absolute security. Third parties may intercept or access personal data without permission, or technology may malfunction.

optOut.title: Opt Out
optOut.description: You can withdraw your consent to the collection, use and/or disclosure of your personal data.

access.title: Access Data
access.description: You can request access and/or correction of your personal data that we hold.

consequences.title: Consequences of Withdrawal
consequences.description: Withdrawal of consent may result in us being unable to continue providing Services to you, depending on the extent of the withdrawal.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about this privacy policy or want to exercise your rights over personal data, please don't hesitate to contact us.

footer.disclaimer: This Privacy Policy may be changed at any time. Changes will be announced through our website.
